description: Detects execution of client32.exe (NetSupport RAT) from an unusual location (outside of 'C:\Program Files')
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Remote Access Tool - NetSupport Execution From Unusual Location
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\client32.exe") OR (Product:*NetSupport\ Remote\ Control*) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:*client32.exe*) OR (winlog.event_data.Imphash:"a9d50692e95b79723f3e76fcf70d023e") OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:*IMPHASH\=a9d50692e95b79723f3e76fcf70d023e*)) AND (NOT process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*")))
